name: nonresident
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who is not living in or at a place: Nonresidents of the state pay higher tuition fees.

not living in or at a place: During the summer the town has a large nonresident population of vacationers. One of the women has a nonresident boyfriend.
More examplesFewer examplesMore than one in three nonresident parents fail to pay any of the money they owe to support their children.We are specialists in managing residential property for non-resident landlords.Florida has 10,000 nonresident foreign students enrolled in state community colleges and universities.
